banner.title: Learn and plan for your retirement
banner.text: It's never too early or too late to learn about your retirement options and plan for your future. Find out about public pensions, when to take them and tips to consider for your retirement income.

description: There are many factors to consider before you retire.

apply.heading: Ready to Apply of CPP and OAS? Get started now

description.text: To apply online you can sign in or register for a My Service Canada Account (MSCA). To apply in-person or by mail, you can complete a paper application.

manage.title: Manage
manage.heading: Take control of your federal old age benefits with the "My Service Canada" Account (MSCA)

description.text: You can do a lot with your MSCA, including:
list: Create and submit your Canada Pension Plan and Old Age Security application(s).
Check the status, payment dates and amounts for your federal old age benefits.
Update your mailing address and banking information.
